content: crochet a cute pumpkin hat for the halloween season this easy crochet pattern includes sizes from baby to adult making it perfect for family costumes fall events and cozy autumn days the hat is worked back and forth in row then seamed to create the shape it features a classic pumpkin design with a stem and a fun curlicue vine this quick and cozy project is perfect for gifts craft fairs or
